news.title: Divided Fed approves third rate cut this year, sees slower pace ahead
news.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday made its final final interest rate move of the year.

news.title: The Fed is the most divided it's been in more than a decade
news.description: Three members of the Federal Open Market Committee didn't agree with the central bank's quarter percentage point cut on Wednesday.

news.title: Dow jumps 380 points after Fed rate cut as traders bet more easing is coming next year: Live updates
news.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average continued to rise on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve's latest interest rate decision.
